channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Top AI Agentic Workflow Patterns】顶级 AI 代理工作流程模式
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at the most popular agentic workflow patterns and how they work.】在本文中，我们将了解最流行的代理工作流模式及其工作原理。

item.title: 【EP193: Database Types You Should Know in 2025】EP193：2025 年您应该了解的数据库类型
item.description: 【There’s no such thing as a one-size-fits-all database anymore.】不再有“一刀切”的数据库了。

item.title: 【How OpenAI, Gemini, and Claude Use Agents to Power Deep Research】OpenAI、Gemini 和 Claude 如何使用代理来推动深度研究
item.description: 【We will walk through the architecture that enables Deep Research, how different LLMs implement it, how agents coordinate with one another, and how the final report is synthesized and validated before being delivered to the user.】我们将介绍支持深度研究的架构、不同的法学硕士如何实施它、代理如何相互协调，以及最终报告在交付给用户之前如何合成和验证。

item.title: 【Must-Know System Performance Strategies】必须了解的系统性能策略
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at system performance in detail, understand how it can be measured, and investigate key strategies that can be used to improve the performance of a system on different levels.】在本文中，我们将详细研究系统性能，了解如何测量它，并研究可用于在不同级别提高系统性能的关键策略。

item.title: 【The $250 Million Paper】价值 2.5 亿美元的论文
item.description: 【This article explains what Molmo is, why it matters, and how it solves a long-standing problem in vision language modeling.】本文解释了 Molmo 是什么、它为何重要以及它如何解决视觉语言建模中长期存在的问题。

item.title: 【Dropbox Multimedia Search: Making File Search More Useful】Dropbox 多媒体搜索：使文件搜索更有用
item.description: 【In this article, we’ll explore how the Dropbox engineering team implemented multimedia search features and the technical challenges they faced along the way.】在本文中，我们将探讨 Dropbox 工程团队如何实现多媒体搜索功能以及他们在此过程中面临的技术挑战。

item.title: 【How Reddit Migrated Comments Functionality from Python to Go】Reddit 如何将评论功能从 Python 迁移到 Go
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how Reddit carried out this migration and the challenges it faced.】在本文中，我们将了解 Reddit 如何进行此迁移以及它面临的挑战。

item.title: 【EP192: What is a REST API?】EP192：什么是 REST API？
item.description: 【REST (Representational State Transfer) is an architectural style for building APIs that use HTTP for communication. To be considered RESTful, an API should follow six key constraints:】REST（表述性状态传输）是一种用于构建使用 HTTP 进行通信的 API 的架构风格。要被视为 RESTful，API 应遵循六个关键约束：

item.title: 【How DoorDash Moved to a Service Mesh to Handle 80M Requests/Second】DoorDash 如何迁移到服务网格以每秒处理 80M 请求
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how DoorDash’s infrastructure team went through this journey and the difficulties they faced.】在本文中，我们将了解 DoorDash 的基础设施团队如何经历这一历程以及他们面临的困难。

item.title: 【A Guide to Service Mesh Architectural Pattern】服务网格架构模式指南
item.description: 【In this article, we will explore the reasons behind the existence of service mesh, its inner workings, and how to determine if it is the right tool for our specific needs.】在本文中，我们将探讨服务网格存在背后的原因、其内部工作原理，以及如何确定它是否是满足我们特定需求的正确工具。
